content.rendered:
private mani pedi parties
at THE TEN SPOT®

book birthday, bachelorette, bridal shower, baby shower, holiday fête, corporate team building events & more

manis, pedis and mimosas – does anything go better together?! we don’t think so.
so, when it comes to being the host with the most – THE TEN SPOT® is the spot to host your event.

get exclusive use of our space to polish and pamper your guests with our signature and sought after services.
up the anté to your hearts content because we’ll help you plan the whole thing –
add on drinks, nibbles, even a dj – if we can make it happen we will!

not all of our bars offer private party opportunities but many do! start with reaching out to your local bar.

please note that we require a deposit for all private parties as well as a credit on file. in the event of a cancellation of the entire party, we require no less than seven [7] days’ notice in advance of the scheduled party date. cancellation of the event less than seven [7] days in advance will result in the 25% deposit not being refunded.
